about_the_game:
This is the Hololive temporary office on the 8th floor.

After finishing work, I was about to get on the elevator and go down to the first floor.

However, once I got on the elevator and when the door opened again, I realized I was back on the 8th floor.

No matter how many times I take the elevator, I always get taken off on the 8th floor.

When I looked inside the elevator, I found a notice.

"If you notice anomaly, get on the red elevator."

"If you can't find anomaly, take the blue elevator."

“Aim for the first floor.”

I decided to follow the instructions in order to escape from this office.

Escape from the office

Escape from the looping office.

To escape from the office

If you notice anomaly, get on the red elevator.

If you can't find anomaly, take the blue elevator.

Aim for the first floor.

More than 70 Hololive member appear! !

More than 70 Hololive members from Hololive JP, ID, EN, and DEV_IS will appear in the game!

Hololive members may surprise you or hide to avoid being seen.

Over 100 anomalies

There are over 100 anomalies in the office.

Many anomalies will appear, including ones related to Hololive members and things in the office.

Observe the office carefully and make sure you don't miss any unusual changes.

"Anomaly Mode" and "Everyday Mode"

You can choose the mode to play according to your play style.

"Anomaly Mode"

Difficulty: Normal

Horror effects available

Game over effects available

You can enjoy the original atmosphere of the game

"Everyday Mode"

Difficulty: Easy

Horror effect None

Game over effect None

Many Hololive members will appear

The rules of the game are the same as (Anomaly mode)

*To discover all the anomalies, you need to play two modes.

Hidden truth

Why did they decide to move to a temporary office?

What awaits you after you escape?

And what is the truth hidden in the temporary office?

Various mysteries are hidden inside the office.

Let's uncover all the truths.

Extra Contents (bonus movie)

If you find many anomalies, a bonus movie limited to this game will be released! !

Movies of Hololive members appearing in this game will be released, so

You can watch the movie anytime!

Looking for anomaly ideas! !

We are looking for anomaly ideas that you would like to see appear in this game!

We are looking for ideas for various types of anomalies, such as cute anomaly, horror anomaly, gag anomaly, etc.!

The anomaly you came up with may appear in the game! ?

Check the QR code in the image for details! !

This game is published under CCMC Corp(※1)'s Indie game brand "holo Indie".(※2)

This game is allowed to be monetized under the examination and terms of "holo Indie".

Please note that any monetized derivative work games that include Cover Corp.'s content outside of holo Indie is not covered by these terms and is not allowed.

※1. About CCMC Corp.

CCMC Corp. is entrusted with website management (ex: steam) including, examination, publishing and other necessary tasks by Cover Corp.

※2. About "holo Indie"

holo Indie's objective is to cooperate with hololive production fans and creators.

It is a game brand that offers "Game Creator Support Program" for the derivative work games.

For more details about "holo Indie", Please refer to the Cover Corp.'s "Derivative work guidelines".

name: holo8

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows10
  • Processor: Corei5 3Ghz or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 or GPU 4GB RAM
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

short_description: Escape from the looping office. Observe the office carefully and look for any anomaly to reach the main entrance.
